issue.title: Crash resulting in no web ui (and probably nothing working anymore)
issue.body:
When starting Syncthing, I can quickly go to "Web GUI". After a few seconds, the Web GUI seems to loose connection but the Android app seems fine (except for maybe related #1167). From the Android App, if I now ask for "Web GUI", I get:
